[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-text-canvas](./harp-text-canvas.md) &gt; [FontCatalog](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.md) &gt; [getGlyphs](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.getglyphs.md)

## FontCatalog.getGlyphs() method

Retrieves the loaded \[\[GlyphData\]\] for the specified text. Returns `undefined` if the assets for these glyphs haven't been loaded yet.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getGlyphs(input: string, style: TextRenderStyle, letterCaseArray?: boolean[]): GlyphData[] | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | string | Input text. |
|  style | [TextRenderStyle](./harp-text-canvas.textrenderstyle.md) | Specific \[\[TextRenderStyle\]\] to get glyphs for. |
|  letterCaseArray | boolean\[\] | Array containing the original letter case for the requested glyphs. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[GlyphData](./harp-text-canvas.glyphdata.md)<!-- -->\[\] \| undefined

Array containing \[\[GlyphData\]\] for each character of the input text.
